Package com.rotartsi.jgame.event

Class DesktopUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rotartsi.jgame.event.DesktopUtils
  • public class DesktopUtils
extends Object
    Easy way to perform actions such as opening the webbrowser and printing files to the local printer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DesktopUtils()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean browseDir​(File file)
      Open the specified directory in the default file explorer.
      static boolean mailTo​(String sendTo, String subject, String cc, String body, String bcc)
      Format URI from arguments and call mailTo(URI) URI is formatted from the string "mailto:%s?subject=%s&cc=%s&body=%s&bcc=%s"
      static boolean mailTo​(URI uri)
      Try to open URI in the default mail client.
      static boolean moveToTrash​(File file)
      Move the specified file to trash (if supported)
      static boolean openBrowser​(URI uri)
      Open URI in webbrowser if it is supported.
      static boolean openFile​(File file)
      Open the file with the default application.
      static boolean openFileEdit​(File file)
      Open specified file for editing in default editor program.
      static boolean openMail()
      Try to open the default mail client (not to a specific URI, though.
      static boolean printFile​(File file)
      Print file to local printer if it is supported.
      static void reload()
      Reload internal desktop object.

      • mailTo

        public static boolean mailTo​(String sendTo,
                             String subject,
                             String cc,
                             String body,
                             String bcc)
        Format URI from arguments and call mailTo(URI) URI is formatted from the string "mailto:%s?subject=%s&cc=%s&body=%s&bcc=%s"
        Parameters:
        sendTo - Address(es) to send mail to.
        subject - Subject of email
        cc - CC
        body - Body of email
        bcc - BCC
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • openMail

        public static boolean openMail()
        Try to open the default mail client (not to a specific URI, though. See mailTo(URI)
        Returns:
        True if successful
